apps.name: Fever Monitor
apps.main-features: This app makes easier to add your body temperature to Health app. In this app, you can see the transition of your body temperature graphically. Also, this app can notify you to take your body temperature at a certain time.
apps.note: You can add other people up to 5, but only you can link your data with Health app.
apps.future-plan: Export and backup the data, Add widget, Support Android

apps.name: Subs Manager
apps.main-features: This app makes easier to manage your subscriptions. It can notify you the billing date at a certain date and time.

apps.name: Theme Automator
apps.main-features: This app can automatically change the light or dark theme of Windows at sunrise/sunset or a certain time.
apps.future-plan: Change wallpaper at the same time
